item.title: [DISTRELEC-3762] ERROR / [DataSheetAssetElementConverter] / Could not resolve document type for download media [00000410_mul_tds]
item.summary: ERROR / [DataSheetAssetElementConverter] / Could not resolve document type for download media [00000410_mul_tds]

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Hallo Patrick, bitte alle leeren "10_datasheetdocumenttype_lov" Werte bei den Datasheets den Standardwert "Datenblatt" in GER Kontext schreiben. Anschliessend Techniker darauf hinweisen. Danke.
File mit Datasheets mit fehlenden und ergänzten Dokumenttypen in Attribut "10_datasheetdocumenttype_lov" an Claude Müller gesendet.

This error still occurs many many times!

Could not find any error in this manner anymore.
BR, Patrick

Hi Adrian
These are the actual assets which should have no document type specified:

[otasdemir@datblbk01001x archive]$ zless pim_import.log-2015-06-23.gz | grep "Could not resolve document type for download media"
2015-06-23 23:23:46,465 ERROR [task-scheduler-2] - - - - [DataSheetAssetElementConverter] Could not resolve document type for download media [04201513_02]

2015-06-23 23:28:02,986 ERROR [task-scheduler-2] - - - - [DataSheetAssetElementConverter] Could not resolve document type for download media [695421]

But asset with ID=

  • 04201513_02, has specified as document type: "Datenblatt"
  • 679080, has specified as document type: "Product Datasheet"
  • BSP149xx_eng_tds, has specified as document type: "Product Datasheet"
    The information of these 3 datasheets are submitted from PIM export file correctly.

@Patrick: Please check document type again. E.g. "04201513_02" In the latest imported master XML (DIS_10_ger.xml_20150624044230375.gz) is defined as <Value AttributeID="10_datasheetdocumenttype_lov" ID="lov_datasheettype_txt_02900">Instruction manual</Value>
As mentioned above, the attribute 10_datasheetdocumenttype_lov is used to determine the type.

We currently honor the following types:

        DOCUMENT_TYPE_MAP.put("ATEX-Zertifikat", "certificates");
        DOCUMENT_TYPE_MAP.put("Aktualisierung", "software");
        DOCUMENT_TYPE_MAP.put("Broschüre", "brochures");
        DOCUMENT_TYPE_MAP.put("CE-Zertifikat", "certificates");
        DOCUMENT_TYPE_MAP.put("Datenblatt", "datasheets");
        DOCUMENT_TYPE_MAP.put("Handbuch", "manuals");
        DOCUMENT_TYPE_MAP.put("Material Datasheet", "datasheets");
        DOCUMENT_TYPE_MAP.put("Prüfprotokoll-Vorlage", "templates");
        DOCUMENT_TYPE_MAP.put("REACH-Erklärung", "certificates");
        DOCUMENT_TYPE_MAP.put("Sicherheitsdatenblatt", "datasheets");
        DOCUMENT_TYPE_MAP.put("Software", "software");
        DOCUMENT_TYPE_MAP.put("Treiber", "software");
        DOCUMENT_TYPE_MAP.put("Zertifikat", "certificates");

Do we have to add additional types like "Instruction manual" and maybe others...?
If something is not clear, just call.

Hello Adrian
Yes, please add following types:

  • Energy label
  • Instruction manual
    Thank you very much.
I have added Instruction manual and Product Datasheet. But I have not found any asset of document type Energy label (so I have not added this one.)

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6468] RO P - No activation e-mail is sent
item.description:
Issue re-tested. No activation e-mail is sent to distrelec.testing.
___________________________________________________________________________
Our new customers in RO webshop dont get any registration-mail to activate their account.

So they cant buy over the RO-webshop.

 

We have tested this issue with following mail-adresses and we didn’t get regsitration-mails, too.

 

BUT the customer-data are in hybris, and there we can set the hakerl at “Aktiviert über Douple Opt-In”

Then the customer gets an welcome-mail and then he can make his webshop-orders.

 

 

Please give us info.

Thank you.

comments.comment: I verified this as well on P. Please fix this issue, thx.
High-level estimate 3h
Rafael Burlet | Distrelec what you mean by high-level estimate?
Wait for Adrian.
Hi Surendra, Please update whit your findings, thx.

Hi Rafi,
Diese Problem habe ich erst selbst Grundlage geprüft. Es ist erfolglos geworden. Dennach mit Francesco, denn mit Nabil und Adrian angeschaut. Sie alle haben keine Anhung. Wir mussen vor ein Deployment schauen. Heute diskutierten wir in Team Meeting.
Hi Surendra, Did you have any findings/hints pointing to the root-cause while checking with Francesco, Nabil and Adrian?

Hi Rafi, As we discussed in team meeting, we should ignore it.

We see after the new deployment.
Hi Surendra, Whats the status here?
Ticket needs to be overtaken by Namics or Hybris as we couldn't find the problem internally.
Surendra, please check if the problem is coming from the long impex values. If this is not the problem, we can hand it further to hybris.
Hi, Yes. I had just finished checking it. we must forward it to the hybris.
Please setup an email to the service-desk of Hybris aligned to the email which David sent out. Please send it first to me and nabil so we can double-check, thanks.
Email has been sent by Nabil to help desk
Please ask for update to Hybris and post it here.

Hi Nabil,

What's the Status?

Hi David,

I did not receive any answer from Hybris.

Hi David,

here after the response from Hybris:

Yes. The reason is that In EmailMessage Type definition the column
type for body is defined as HYBRIS.LONG_STRING which is mapped as
varchar2(4000) in core-advanced-deployment.xml. But our message body
for your Romanian template is of size greater than 4000 characters, So
you are getting the below exception on Oracle Database.
You can try to redeclare emailmessage body attribute in your
acceleratorservices-items.xml like this
Change body column in acceleratorservices-items.xml and db has been
initialized with clob:

<attribute qualifier="body" type="java.lang.String">
    <persistence type="property">
         <columntype database="oracle">
               <value>CLOB</value>
         </columntype>
         <columntype>
               <value>HYBRIS.LONG_STRING</value>
         </columntype>
    </persistence>
    <modifiers optional="false" initial="true" write="false" />
    <description>Body of the email message.</description>
</attribute>


Run Update from hybris admin, check only update running system option.

Simple modify in database will return an error so you have to create
new column, and copy data This is a script which has been tested:

ALTER TABLE emailmessage ADD clob_body CLOB;--add new clob column
UPDATE emailmessage SET clob_body = p_body; --copy values to clob column
ALTER TABLE emailmessage DROP COLUMN p_body;-- remove p_body varchar column
ALTER TABLE emailmessage RENAME COLUMN clob_body TO p_body; -- rename clob column to p_body

Execute it line by line to ensure that all messages has been copied
Please let us know if it is working for you. And confirm the ticket if
the issue is resolved.
thanks for Fixing it.
The problem is that we have already exactly the same configuration that they suggest, so the changes suggested wont fix the problem.

Hi David,

After some mail exchange with hybris they give us the following answer:

It seems that the issue you have is related to an unexpected behavior
in the platform. which has been fixed in version 5.
https://jira.hybris.com/browse/PLA-13083.
So I would suggest that you upgrade to a higher version since the
problem is in lower levels of hybris and providing a workaround is not
possible.
But there is a workaround which I tested on my own system and it seems
to be working. I changed all the varchar(2)[string] attributes for
emailMessage itemtype in acceleratorservice-item.xml file.
I have attached the modified file. Just download and copy it with your
file.
Please note that this has not been tested completely and I am not sure
whether you are going to face problem or not so please consider
upgrading first.
Hope this helps.
Regards
Reyhaneh

From Hybris:

Hi
I forgot to mention that you also have to create the clob fields in
the database and copy your data. so here are the scipts for doing that.



ALTER TABLE emailmessage ADD clob_subject CLOB;
UPDATE emailmessage SET clob_subject = p_subject;
ALTER TABLE emailmessage DROP COLUMN p_subject;
ALTER TABLE emailmessage RENAME COLUMN clob_subject TO p_subject;

ALTER TABLE emailmessage ADD clob_reply CLOB;
UPDATE emailmessage SET clob_reply = p_replytoaddress;
ALTER TABLE emailmessage DROP COLUMN p_replytoaddress;
ALTER TABLE emailmessage RENAME COLUMN clob_reply TO p_replytoaddress;


ALTER TABLE emailmessage ADD clob_sentmessage CLOB;
UPDATE emailmessage SET clob_sentmessage = p_sentmessageid;
ALTER TABLE emailmessage DROP COLUMN p_sentmessageid;
ALTER TABLE emailmessage RENAME COLUMN clob_sentmessage TO
p_sentmessageid;

My Answer:

thank you for forwarding me the answer. However, I don’t think this will solve the problem because all fields does not need to be of type CLOB except the BODY which is already CLOB (refer to the previous screenshot). For the registration confirmation email, where the problem is actually, we do not use the field “reply to”. Regarding the subject field, we are sure to not exceed the 255 characters ( as it is of type VARCHAR(255) ) and this is its content “Distrelec Confirmarea adresei dvs. de e-mail”. Finally, the “sent message id” field is managed by the platform itself and we do not set it manually.

Their Answer:

So in this case, the only solution would be upgrading to version 5.
Since backports are not provided got your version 4.8.8.

Dear Nabil,

As discussed a few weeks back Hybris has to provide a solution without 5.x.

My contact at Hybris now told me that the question is back to us. Could you please check and handle if they stay on their Position that we Need a 5.x upgrade, escalate it to me so I can handle it.
Status?

Hi,

I sent the JDBC log to Gabor who will forward it to SAP. Francesco is also on this issue.

Hi Nabil,
Can you please check the Status. If not reponse from Hybris I will escalate the issue.

Hi David,
I sent last week the JDBC logs to Gabor to forward them to Hybris. Yesterday I asked him if he did forward them and his answer was no (because he asked Richard to create a user for me to be able to follow the issue by myself). I got the account credentials yesterday but I still need authorizations. Richard told me he will check that during today.

Note: I am on it with francesco.

Here the last answer from SAP support

Dear Customer,
 
Thank you for a jdbc.log what you sent me by email. I have attached it in this ticket to sustain cohesion.
I have made first investigation and I see some suspicion stuff:
122123|master|150623-15:21:00:122|31 ms|statement|UPDATE emailmessage SET hjmpTS = ? ,modifiedTS=?,p_body=?,p_fromaddress=?,p_fromaddresspos=?,p_replytoaddress=?,p_sent=?,p_subject=? WHERE PK = ? |UPDATE emailmessage SET hjmpTS = 1 ,modifiedTS='2015-06-23 15:21:00.09',p_body='
This line of log indicate that query was not wrote to the log at all. There is missing parameters in the SET clause like (fromaddresspos=?,p_replytoaddress=?). It could happen because exception occurred (ORA-24816). Probably order of columns during update were not re-ordered correctly.
IMPORTANT
To avoid the ORA-24816 error the p_body column should be added on the last param position in the UPDATE SET, INSERT commands . If not, patch does not work for your customization. We have to figure out why.
Please perform below to make sure where the error is:
1.       Execute customer registration test for non-Romanian workshop.
2.       Execute customer registration test for Romanian workshop
3.       Send me the jdbc.log, console.log, hybris\temp\hybris\bmp.*process*.log (They are created during sending email process) files.
4.       Send me your customized java classes:
        com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.service.process.email.DefaultDistEmailGenerationService
com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.service.process.email.DefaultDistEmailGenerationService
 
I want to compare the position of p_body parameter for two of this tests.
I am still working on your issue with strong effort. I am in touch with developing team to speed up results. Please be patient.
Best Regards
Tomasz Zason
SAP Active Global Support

I've just sent another email to the SAP support with the answer

Here my email:

Dear Tomasz
Thank you for your answer.
We have performed the required steps and we have collected the jdbc logs and the console logs.
I was not able to find the bmp.* files.
You can find the logs in the attachment.

Thank you very much for your support
Best Regards
Francesco

Dear Customer,

Firstly, thanks for logs. They showed that despite the patch, what was backported in the 4.8.4, your CLOB database column is not re-ordered correctly.

I have created ECP jira task and put it in the attachment. Thanks for your contribution in an investigation.

I am working on a workaround which I hope be able to present you soon.

Tomasz Zason 

SAP Active Global Support

02.07.2015 - 11:29:06 CET - Reply by SAP    
Hello Mr Gabor
I am informing you that KBA document has been created and attached to
the incident.
Please go through a resolution section and apply the workaround.
Bear in mind that it is just for 4.8 version. In the 5.x
accelerators the body of email is stored in the Media if it contains
more than 4000 characters. This workaround should be removed after
upgrade to the 5.x.

Let me know if you have any problems or questions with apply it.

Kind Regards
Tomasz Zason 
SAP Active Global Support
I've attached the pdf version of the SAP Note 2187625 that contains the resolution.

Hi David,

I made the changes recommended by hybris and this should be part of the next deployment.

BR,
/Nabil.
hi Nabil, can you test it? will it be with the next Q deployment or was it only occuring on P?

Hi David,

this issue is only on P. This afternoon we will deploy the version v3.5.3 to Q and this fix will be in. So it will be part of the next P deployment which is planned for tomorrow evening.
